Program Title: MileageSmart Used High Efficiency Vehicle Incentive Program
Program Description: The State of Vermont has partnered with Capstone to offer the MileageSmart program. This offers low and moderate income car buyers an incentive covering 25% of the upfront cost of a used high efficiency vehicle, up to $5,000.
Rebate Value: 25% of the upfront cost, up to $5,000
Equipment Standards Restrictions: Vehicles must have an efficiency of 40 miles per gallon or higher. This includes many hybrid, plug-in hybrid and all-electric vehicles. The car needs to be pre-owned, rated at least 40 combined MPG or MPGe, and located at a Vermont Dealership.
Income Restrictions: Must be at or below 80% State Median Income (based on AGI). You must meet income eligibility requirements and be pre-approved prior to a purchase.
